item.title: Il Grande Macello
item.author: Author
item.description: Download article “Il Grande Macello”, by Stefano Mangini Il Grande Macello Few months ago, I decided to wrote a divulgation article on food choices and sustainability, explaining those reasons which motivated me to approach a full plant based diet. Unfortunately, the article was targeted to an Italian audience and it is then written in Italian, because you can already find great resources and information on the topic in english.
